Flow.description:
DB: 18 july - compartmentalise
Flow Description: Flow to Assign Opp to Verification, launched from Wrap Up Opportunity H2 (main flow that houses entire skeleton of working opps)
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: Link_Bond
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!bondOppIdVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Bond Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: Link_PreApproval
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!paIdOppVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Pre-Approval Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: outstandingDocsMain
formulas.expression: IF({!mainMissingID} = "ID", "ID"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingPayslip} = "Payslip", "Payslip"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingBankS} = "Bank Statement", "Bank Statement"+ BR(), null)

Flow.label: Assign To Verification Subflow

recordCreates.name: Create_Case_for_Direct_Verification_Team
recordCreates.label: Create Case for Direct Verification Team

recordUpdates.name: Update_Case_Owner_to_Opp_Owner
recordUpdates.label: Update Case Owner to Opp Owner

fields.name: oppTeamError
fields.fieldText: An Opportunity Team does not exist for this Opportunity. Please select another Assign to option in order to continue.

fields.name: reassignFailed
fields.fieldText: No members available from the Pre Approval Verification team, please select another option.

textTemplates.name: chatterPostMessage
textTemplates.text:
<---- Customer Email Sent ---->
Template Selection: {!theTemplate}
Sent To: {!applicantFullName}
Sent From: @[{!$User.Id}]
Sent Date: {!sentTime}
